title: Beef with Mushrooms

ingredients.content: 2 pinches fine sea salt, or to taste
2 pinches ground black pepper, or to taste
600 g beef rump steak, trimmed, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)
500 g button mushrooms, halved, quartered if large

preparations.content: Place onions, oil and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add salt and pepper. Insert simmering basket and weigh in beef. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in mushrooms. Cover Varoma then steam <b>12 min/Varoma/speed <b>. Set covered Varoma aside then remove simmering basket with aid of spatula and keep warm.
Add mustard, yoghurt and cream cheese to mixing bowl then mix <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Adjust seasoning to taste.
Add steamed beef and mushrooms to sauce then reheat <b>4 min/70°C//speed 2<b>. Serve warm.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with mashed potatoes or rice.
For vegetarians, replace steak with tofu.
Juices from the steak and water from the mushrooms drip down to create the steaming liquid!
